    • Method Detail

      • startUp

        public void startUp(java.lang.String host,
                    int port,
                    java.lang.String keystoreFile,
                    java.lang.String keystorePassword,
                    java.lang.String truststoreFile,
                    java.lang.String truststorePassword,
                    java.lang.String staticFilesFolder,
                    java.lang.String externalFilesFolder)
        Description copied from interface: Backend
        Ignites the Sabina server, listening on the specified port, running SSL secured with the specified keystore and truststore. If truststore is null, keystore is reused.
        Specified by:
        startUp in interface Backend
        Parameters:
        host - The address to listen on.
        port - The port.
        keystoreFile - The keystore file location as string.
        keystorePassword - The password for the keystore.
        truststoreFile - Truststore file location as string, leave null to reuse keystore.
        truststorePassword - The trust store password.
        staticFilesFolder - The route to static files in classPath.
        externalFilesFolder - The route to static files external to classPath.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Description copied from interface: Backend
        Stops the Sabina server.
        Specified by:
        shutDown in interface Backend
